title: Mathieu van der Poel crashes out of mountain bike world championships: ‘I’m angry with myself’
content:
Early abandon spells doom for hopes of becoming first male to win cyclocross, road, and mountain bike world titles in one season.

Read the full article at Mathieu van der Poel crashes out of mountain bike world championships: ‘I’m angry with myself’ on Velo.
author: ahood
